pkgmetadata.longdescription: Working with 'LimeSurvey' Surveys and Responses // 'LimeSurvey' is Free/Libre Open Source Software for the development and administrations of online studies, using sophisticated tailoring capabilities to support multiple study designs (see https://www.limesurvey.org). This package supports programmatic creation of surveys that can then be imported into 'LimeSurvey', as well as user friendly import of responses from 'LimeSurvey' studies.
